Name: Tirzepatide
Description: Used for type 2 diabetes to lower blood sugar.

Name: Epinephrine
Description: Treats severe allergic reactions (anaphylaxis) and low blood presure caused by septic shock.
SideEffects: Breathing problems, pounding heartbeat, pale skin, nausea, dizziness, weakness, headache

Name: Dopamine
Description: Improves the pumping strength of the heart and improves blood flow to the kidneys.

Name: Calcium Gluconate
Description: Used to treat or prevent low calcium levels.
